import React, { useState } from "react"; import infologo from "../../assets/personal-info.jpg"; import memberlogo from "../../assets/memberpic.svg"; const Jachaikoron = () => { const [isEditOpen, setIsEditOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddNumberOpen, setIsAddNumberOpen] = useState(false); const [isOtpOpen, setIsOtpOpen] = useState(false); const [memberInfo, setMemberInfo] = useState({ username: "রোহান", email: "rakibuhasanrakib@gmail.com", dob: "1995-05-12", mobile: "+880 ******8002", currency: "BDT", }); const [formData, setFormData] = useState(memberInfo); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setMemberInfo(formData); // মূল স্টেট আপডেট হবে setIsEditOpen(false); // মডাল বন্ধ হবে }; return (
